sub_title: It is my challenge to deliver you the best vision solution the fastest way | vision light | camera solutions
summary:
* Are you the buyer for industrial machinery and equipment?
* Are you looking for clear vision lighting for your production line? 

Hello, I am Natascha Overhof, may I be of service to you?   
I am the sales – and office manager of Vision Consultancy. I am an energetic, enthusiastic person and a quick thinker. It is my passion to come up with the best, fastest, most suitable solution to your problem on delivering your vision light and camera system and all complementary equipment. 

As an independent partner we help you to deliver outstanding quality on your automated  production line. Our machine vision solutions and machine vision lighting come with the technical knowledge of my partner Marcel Heugen and team. 

---
Keeping up with the relentless pace of change in the techniques of the vision lighting world can be a daily challenge. The key to long-term success lies in the cooperation you have with your supplier, with us. Because of our engineering expertise we help you choose the vision  lighting technique that fits your line of production now and in the future. 

Our capability of helping you is in the area of production lines in packaging, food, automotive, pharma, automation and  logistics.

For us it is of great importance to invest in a firm, trustworthy relationship with you, because we want to help you find the right lighting solution. 
Of course this involves training and education of your staff. Training whilst operating the production line as well as learning how to adjust for the best quality possible. 

We deliver all over Europe. 

* Is your company starting an automated production line? 
* Are you interested in our solutions for your industrial vision lighting?
Please send your e-mail or call us at:

E: n.overhof@vision-consultancy.nl
T: +31438522651

treasury_media.title: Machine Vision Shop
treasury_media.description: Machine Vision Webshop levert Vision Sensoren, Smart Camera's , Vision Systemen en Custom-Tailored Vision Solutions.

profile_positions.description:
Vision Consultancy is a solution provider in the industrial machine vision industry. 
Since 1993 our engineers have been delivering and integrating industrial camera systems and vision solutions. Because of our experience and knowledge, we developed a method of working which requires only training and support of your technical staff, when integrating a new line of machine vision. 

Are you building machines or are you in Industrial automation ? 
Training and support will be given to your engineers to configure, install and commissioning. 

Do you have a production plant with several production lines? 
After research and inquiry we not only advise you our best futureproof solution on integrating vision technology in your factory. We also help in establishing the specifications needed for your production line up to and including determine the final wanted results. 

Are you an OEM company?
Allow us to help you in choosing the best choice in vision technology.

We deliver standard vision solution as well as customized solutions and optimizations. 

* Are you interested in our solutions for your industrial vision lighting?
Let me help you to get your best vision solution the fastest way. 

Please send me your e-mail or give me call:

E: n.overhof@vision-consultancy.nl
T: +31438522651

profile_positions.description:
As the owner and cook of Happy Dolphin Cooking I organise cook workshops for adults on location or at my own cooking studio in Maastricht. 
Happy Dolphin Cooking also takes care of the catering of your (business) party big or small, BBQ or fancy dinner. 

Cooking and spoiling people with great food, is what I love to do. 
Please check my website for further information or follow me on my Facebook.
profile_positions.title: Independent Cook | Businessowner

profile_positions.description:
BNI is an American franchised networking organization with around 233,000 members in 8,399 local chapters worldwide. 
Every wednesday at 6:45 hrs I meet the other members to discuss business and support each other's businesses by sharing referrals. (Givers Gain) 

As one of the Visitor Hosts I welcome the visitors, make visitors feel at ease and ask them for their breakfast contribution.
profile_positions.title: Visitor Host

profile_positions.description:
Being a person with an independent, energetic mind, I started my own business as a babysitting service. Daily I had 30 to 40  babysitters supervising children. 

After 3 years I took the chance to sell my company to MIK, a childcare service. That way I could take the Babysit Service to a next level. 
In 2011 it was time for me to move on to my next level.
profile_positions.title: Salesmanager | Relationsmanager | Businessowner
